overview:
Mark brings strong leadership and innovative thinking to this executive role where he is responsible for the Sales and Strategy of Logistixs Group. Mark is a sales specialist that knows the technology, solutions, and has the honest straight forward approach which executives need. He is tireless in developing success for him and those he works with. His true passion is helping companies to integrate technology that solves their business needs by utilizing technology.

Prior to joining Logistixs Group, Mark spent the last 14 years in a variety of sales roles helping customers with their technology and strategic needs. He is a specialist in Microsoft, VMWare, disaster recovery, and storage solutions.
